metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2007 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The specific flaw exists within the DPT I2O Controller driver. The issue results from the lack of proper locking when performing operations on an object. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of the kernel.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2007` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.0.0-1006-oem - 6.0.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1004-oem - 6.1.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.0.0-1006-oem - 6.0.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1004-oem - 6.1.0-1004.4
No subscription required
